title: Ex-Wynn Resorts Worker Alleges Casino Giant Spied on Him
text:
A former Wynn Resorts Ltd. employee sued the casino giant, claiming that it organized a spy operation against him after he described sexual-misconduct allegations against the company’s founder, Steve Wynn.

Jorgen Nielsen, who worked as artistic director for the Wynn Las Vegas salon, named several current and former Wynn executives as defendants in his lawsuit, filed in Nevada state court. They include Chief Executive Officer Matt Maddox, former General Counsel Kimmarie Sinatra and a former executive vice president in charge...
description: Wynn Resorts says a suit alleging that the casino company spied on a former employee after he described sexual-misconduct allegations against Steve Wynn is without merit. CEO Matt Maddox is named as a defendant.
